clinical_study.brief_title: Apatinib as Maintenance Therapy After First-line Chemotherapy(DC for 4 Cycles) in Postoperative Recurrence/Metastasis Progressive Gastric Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of apatinib as maintenance therapy after first-line chemotherapy in Postoperative Recurrence / Metastasis Progressive Gastric Cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: Eligible patients will receive apatinib treatment(500mg qd p.o. q28d) until until disease progression or intolerable toxicity or patients withdrawal of consent after 4 cycles of DC first-line chemotherapy or only DC first-line chemotherapy.
